prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered blessing pose with both hands raised in sacred mudra, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating hexagonal water crystal, merkaba, vesica piscis patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and Flower of Life emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor LAZDIXI's profile: 'He who has no supreme name', Aethyr LIT, Water element, Tarot The Hierophant, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Taurus, embodying the essence: 'When LAZDIXI is near, reality feels safeguarded clear boundaries hold firm, keeping the very syntax ...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who has no supreme name'
profile_data.essence: When LAZDIXI is near, reality feels safeguarded clear boundaries hold firm, keeping the very syntax of existence intact.
profile_data.angelic_role: Dominion of Sanctity of Being; guides waveborne wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent water-crystal form that shifts between liquid membrane and prismatic geometric structure, representing the liminal boundary between material and ethereal realms
profile_data.color_reasoning: Teal represents water's depth and transformative nature, silver-white reflects Netzach's divine illumination and the mystical boundary of LIT Aethyr
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing water's molecular intelligence, dimensional transition, and universal creation principle
